snippet: “The Walking Dead: The Game” was selected as the game of the year at the 10th annual Spike Video Game Awards on Friday in Los Angeles, The Associated Press reported.
abstract: The Walking Dead: The Game, developed by Telltale Games and based on Robert Kirkman's comic book series, is selected as game of the year at 10th annual Spike Video Game Awards in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: “The Walking Dead: The Game” was selected as the game of the year at the 10th annual Spike Video Game Awards on Friday in Los Angeles, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: ‘The Walking Dead’ Wins a Video Game Honor
headline.print_headline: ‘The Walking Dead’ Wins A Video Game Honor
